content: This article may **require cleanup** to meet Wikipedia's quality standards. The specific problem is: **too many redlinks and external links.** Please help improve this article if you can. *(August 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* This is a **list of social service agencies (SSA) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**. These agencies are members of the [National Council of Social Service](/wiki/National_Council_of_Social_Service) (NCSS) in Singapore. ## Legend - Syntax: [[Official NCSS registered name]], date of registration ## A-G -
